events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been classified under the refund category due to request for money back.
Assigning the case to a customer support agent specialized in refunds and returns.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help resolve this refund for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the refund?
Sure, my order number is #123456789, and I have attached photos showing the incorrect product I received.
We have processed your refund request. You will receive a full refund within 5-7 business days to your original payment method.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prompt resolution and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund process has been successfully completed and confirmed. Please contact us if you have any other concerns.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received the refund and that everything is now satisfactory on your end.
As there have been no further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience with us.
